name: Mahjong: Medieval Mysteries
description:
Difference games is a publisher dedicated to producing high quality games that combine fun game mechanics with stunning graphics and collectable artwork.

Each set of artwork contains 20 beautiful themed images masterfully created by skilled artists usually spending a day or more on each image!

In this game we partnered with PhatpuppyArt.com, a studio specializing in book covers for best selling authors. They have designed 725+ book covers to date -- some of the authors you may know.

If you love Mahjong we have crafted many unique and distinct worlds in which to play. The core ‘mahjong matching’ experience will be familiar but you will have entirely new worlds, art and characters to explore!
